text: Kai Manne Börje Siegbahn (20 April 1918 – 20 July 2007) was a Swedish physicist. He won the 1981 Nobel Prize in Physics with Arthur Leonard Schawlow and Nicolaas Bloembergen. He was known for his works in high-resolution electron spectroscopy. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Swedish physicists Category:Swedish Nobel Prize winners Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Kai Siegbahn
